oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bell Avenue Church Mother's Sunday School
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bell Avenue Church Mother's Sunday School, . Dr. Allen, Pastor. Mrs. Ambrose B. Underwood (Alzira Henry) is in front row, 5th from left. On the second row, first woman on the left is Gertrude Armstrong Mays (1882-1966) (Mrs. Joel H. Mays). Her daughter Geneva Mays (1906-2007) is third from left on the same row. Knoxville, TN.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Group portraits; Methodist churches; Sunday schools;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
